description: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of the course and may relate to his/her research interests. Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor. Offered based on department decision. May be offered as a 1.00 credit course or .50 credit course.
name: Res: Creating So. History
notes: This is an off-campus course. You will find this course listed in Studio Abroad
prerequisites: determined by individual instructor. Offered based on department decision. May be offered as a 1.00 credit course or .50 credit course.
